unnormalised: Arre bhai, pesticide use is tricky, no? Remember the Vidarbha cotton crisis? Using too much is a big problem. My nani always said "thoda dalo, sab chala jayega" but farmers feel the pressure, especially with monsoons being so unpredictable since 2020. Heard Krishi Vigyan Kendra in Pune is running workshops on safe usage now since 10/10/2023. Maybe we should focus on organic farming like they do in Sikkim from 2016? Seed costs are high, though. 3 PM is when the mandis open; need a good yield!
